source.d4fd659d:
fig = plt.figure()
ax = fig.add_subplot(111)
scatter = ax.scatter(data2['W-L%'],data2['ERA'],c=agglomerative[0],s=50)
ax.set_title('Agglomerative Clustering')
ax.set_xlabel('W-L%')
ax.set_ylabel('ERA')
plt.colorbar(scatter)
